compat-change.description: {@link android.media.session.MediaSession#setMediaButtonBroadcastReceiver( android.content.ComponentName)} throws an {@link java.lang.IllegalArgumentException} if the provided {@link android.content.ComponentName} does not resolve to a valid {@link android.content.BroadcastReceiver broadcast receiver} for apps targeting Android U and above. For apps targeting Android T and below, the request will be ignored.
compat-change.name: THROW_FOR_INVALID_BROADCAST_RECEIVER

compat-change.description: {@link android.media.session.MediaSession#setMediaButtonReceiver(android.app.PendingIntent)} throws an {@link java.lang.IllegalArgumentException} if the provided {@link android.app.PendingIntent} targets an {@link android.app.Activity activity} for apps targeting Android V and above. For apps targeting Android U and below, the request will be ignored.
compat-change.name: THROW_FOR_ACTIVITY_MEDIA_BUTTON_RECEIVER
